page.title: 03PLAYGROUND GAMES 5-8 YEARS
page.content: Our class made up a questionnaire about games we played in the playground.we had lots of different games like skipping,football,gymnastics on the grass,climbing on the climbing frames,singing games,playing with toys,made up games to do with television programmes or films or running games. After morning play, lunch playtime and afternoon play certain people went to the classrooms and asked the children what they had played. The 1st year children liked running games and playing with toys best. The 2nd year children liked playing hopscotch and made up games. The 3rd years liked running games best. the 4th year liked football or running games like bulldog.
